item.title: Hacker Newsletter #490
item.content:encoded:
Facts are stubborn, but statistics are more pliable. //Mark Twain

item.title: Hacker Newsletter #488
item.content:encoded:
Every time you act, you get to decide who you are and want to be. //Kieran Snyder

hackernewsletter

Issue #488 // January 24, 2020 // View in your browser

Let's try something -- hit reply and send me a link to your favorite article of all time. Any topic. –kale

item.title: Hacker Newsletter #485
item.content:encoded:
There are far, far better things ahead than any we leave behind. //C.S. Lewis

hackernewsletter

Issue #485 // January 03, 2020 // View in your browser

Happy New Year! Starting the year off a day late, but looking forward to another year of sharing great reads (and maybe more). In the meantime, grab a cup of tea, as this is two weeks to catch-up on. Enjoy! –kale

#Favorites

//thirtythreeforty comments→

//propublica comments→
